overview: The Story might be fiction but the place, incident, time and circumstances are very close to reality. The Native People who were have been living in harmony and peace in various places of Nepal since the ancient period. These native peoples are being enticed and displaced away from their native land by some groups with strategic planning. The story has tried to depict partial examples of such places. And we are very sorry for any inconvenience caused by it.
title: In Search of Light
